function addUniqueItem(arr,item){if(arr.indexOf(item)===-1)arr.push(item);}function removeItem(arr,item){const index=arr.indexOf(item);if(index>-1)arr.splice(index,1);}// Adapted from array-move
function moveItem(_ref,fromIndex,toIndex){let[...arr]=_ref;const startIndex=fromIndex<0?arr.length+fromIndex:fromIndex;if(startIndex>=0&&startIndex<arr.length){const endIndex=toIndex<0?arr.length+toIndex:toIndex;const[item]=arr.splice(fromIndex,1);arr.splice(endIndex,0,item);}return arr;}export{addUniqueItem,moveItem,removeItem};
